content.text: James and Wei have a car
Each year James drives \(3 600\mathrm{km}\) and Wei drives \(4 800\mathrm{km}\)
On the grid, complete the scatter diagram for these results
The first six points have been plotted for you
What type of correlation does the scatter diagram show?
Answer(b)
Calculate the mean of the marks for Unit A
Answer(c)(i)
Work out the range of the marks for Unit A
Answer(c)(ii)
The mean for Unit B is \(58.6\)
Which unit did the students find more difficult?
Give a reason for your answer
Answer(c)(iii) Unit    .........  because

Use your line of best fit to estimate her score on Unit B
Answer(d)(ii)
Find how many students scored more than 65 marks on both units
Answer(e)
